meanings: be unable to even have a dream

vlive.korean: 여러분 좋은 꿈~ Everyone, sweet dreams. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
루시 당신은 꿈이 뭐예요? Lucy, what is your dream? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
꿈에서 너한테 뽀뽀하는 꿈꾸면 어떡해? What if I dream of kissing you in my dreams? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: What if I dream of kissing you in my dreams?

vlive.korean: [과연 루시는 간호사의 꿈을 이뤘을까?] 1, 2, 3! [Will Lucy achieve her dream as a nurse?] 1, 2, 3! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
vlive.english: [Will Lucy achieve her dream as a nurse?] 1, 2, 3!

vlive.korean: 제 2의 꿈? My second dream? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] "고오급 TMI 티키타카" (한결, 도현 : H&D)

examples.korean: Dreamers do not always remember their dreams. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 꿈을 꾸는 사람들이 자신의 꿈을 항상 기억하는 것은 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Dreamers do not always remember their dreams. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The sound of the telephone intruded into his dreams. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전화벨 소리가 그의 꿈을 방해했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sound of the telephone intruded into his dreams. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The attainment of his ambitions was still a dream. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 야망을 달성하는 것은 아직도 꿈에 지나지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The attainment of his ambitions was still a dream. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Could nothing be rescued from the wreckage of her dreams? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 부서진 꿈으로부터 아무것도 구해 낼 수가 없단 말인가? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Could nothing be rescued from the wreckage of her dreams? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: the end of all his dreams 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 품은 모든 꿈의 종말 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the end of all his dreams Add to Wordbook
